concept.title: Mini Table of Contents For Mobile Devices
concept.shortdesc: WebWorks dedicates time and resources to understanding technologies and devices that content is created on and delivered too.

conbody.p: As we come to understand these elements, we develop features in our product to help our customers take advantage of the new technology. You will find that ePublisher can add rich HTML features to your output by simply assigning the proper style name to the proper section. One of these features is Mini Table of Contents.
